docs.text: Installing Weave GitOps Core vs Team vs Enterprise editions Icon to distinguish between the editions. - Core edition only - Team edition only - Enterprise edition only Differences between editions can be shown in tabs on the feature description: Core edition Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum Donec vitae suscipit est Nulla tempor lobortis orci Team edition Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum Donec vitae suscipit est Nulla tempor lobortis orci Enterprise edition Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum Donec vitae suscipit est Nulla tempor lobortis orci Simple Note Phasellus posuere in sem ut cursus Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. docs.text: Weave GitOps Docs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . For the material theme docs: material theme check versions Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. mkdocs gh-deploy - Build to GitHub pages site Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Weave GitOps Docs
